meanings.sent1: She decided to go for a walk, albeit it was raining outside.
meanings.sent2: He wanted to stay up late, albeit his parents told him to go to bed.
meanings.sent3: The cat, albeit small, managed to scare away the big dog.
meanings.sent4: The tree stood tall, albeit surrounded by shorter bushes.
meanings.sent5: The team won the game, albeit they were the underdogs.

meanings.sent1: He finished the project on time, albeit he had started late.
meanings.sent2: She smiled, albeit feeling nervous inside.
meanings.sent3: The cake tasted delicious, albeit it looked a bit lopsided.
meanings.sent4: The sun shone brightly, albeit the clouds threatened rain.
meanings.sent5: The child laughed, albeit having fallen down moments before.
